caption.p: Moisture content (%) and wettability (s) values obtained in spray-dried powders with different wall materials. SCAS (sodium caseinate), SKIM (skim milk), MD (maltodextrin), BCYC (beta-cyclodextrin), GUM (gum arabic), RMD (resistant-maltodextrin). Numbers 10, 20, and 30 mean concentration (%) of wall materials in liquid feed solution composition for spray-drying.
